bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of nodes and hardenings in the abdomen brought forth by accumulations of stagnant water. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 21: 水癥者，由經絡痞澀，水氣停聚，在於腹內， 大小腸不利所為也。其病腹內有結塊堅強 , “As for water concretion - illness , the reason is that water qi has stagnated and collected in the abdomen because of an obstacle-illness and roughness in the conduits and network vessels. As aresult, the large and small intestines are no longer freely passable. The disease manifests itself as abdominal nodes and hardenings”.
